description: This version of the  Man in Tuxedo emoji has the  Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone on support
apple_vendor_description: The man in a tuxedo emoji on Apple devices presents a sophisticated figure with a medium-dark skin tone, impeccably dressed in classic black formal wear, complete with a crisp white shirt and a bow tie. Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading gives the tuxedo a polished sheen, and realistic lighting accentuates the sharp lines of the suit and the soft, rounded edges of his face. This emoji on Apple devices is ideal for signifying special occasions, elegance, formal events, or a sense of dapper style.
